sys_element_mapping.value:
Trigger➛Chore Assignments Record➛Assigned to➛Name has just started an assigned chore.  See below for details.

Chore assigned on:  Trigger➛Chore Assignments Record➛Created
Chore assigned by:  Trigger➛Chore Assignments Record➛Created by
Chore name:  Trigger➛Chore Assignments Record➛Chore assigned
Chore status:  Trigger➛Chore Assignments Record➛Status

Dont forget to check up on Trigger➛Chore Assignments Record➛Assigned to➛First name and his/her progress!
